# vngcloud_vdb_backup (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "vngcloud_vdb_backup" "backup" {
  action = "default"
  name = "resource_backup"
  description = "Created from terraform"
  instance_id = "db-b22df26e-1fa5-4c90-8d7d-2cdd8c126cdc"
  backup_type = "FULL"
  engine_group = 1
}
```
